featured.text: I tried one when I was a prep cook for Next Level Burgers…tasted awful, just like mashed peas gone to rot.

definition.zh_def: 腐爛，指物體因微生物或化學作用而變質或分解的過程。
definition.en_def: To undergo decomposition or decay, typically due to the action of bacteria or fungi.
definition.example: The fruit began to rot after being left out for too long.
